name: Stop the Nuke/Cats!
description:
The Cats have begun there invasion! You have to be quick and defend the base from the ever increasing invasion while defending your homeland from the incoming missiles!

----How to play.----

The cats are attacking! quickly use the mouse to destroy them! if a device gets broken quickly click the computer and place the missing pieces back.

when a missile is incoming you have to quickly go to the correct console and insert the Lat and Long of where the missile is, switch the dial on and FIRE with the yellow button! But be careful more missiles are heading your way!
